text: António André da Silva Topa (2 September 1954 – 31 October 2021) was a Portuguese engineer and politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party. He was in the Assembly of the Republic from 2015 until his death. Topa died in Lisbon, Portugal on 31 October 2021, aged 67. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Portuguese politicians Category:Portuguese engineers
title: António Topa
